rooms.name: Entrance Lobby

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Art Deco styled living area featuring geometric patterns and metallic accents. Open-plan design for family interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper placement of appliances to promote health and harmony.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional guest bathroom placed in the north-west corner as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area designed with Art Deco elements and sound insulation to promote a healthy lifestyle.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and other essentials, located near the kitchen.

openings.description: Large entrance door aligned with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Art Deco inspired windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with Vastu-aligned positioning to ensure restful sleep and prosperity.

rooms.name: Childroom
rooms.description: Cozy child room designed with soothing colors and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Rooftop terrace accessible from the master bedroom providing scenic views and leisure space.

openings.description: Door leading directly to the rooftop terrace designed in Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Extra bedroom to accommodate extended family members or guests in line with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Quiet study area placed in the eastern section of the floor, fostering concentration and productivity.

openings.description: Art Deco styled window ensuring natural light and ventilation in the study area.
